name: Knowledge is Power
description: Learn the basics of movement and combat
setup_description: General at (2,2) vs General at (5,2), both with 10 HP. Tutorial introduces movement, health, and attack.

name: Ready Player Two
description: Learn about playing cards and mana
setup_description: Teaches card playing, mana system, and basic strategy.

name: Swiftness of Movement
setup_description: Player general at (2,2), opponent general at (6,2) with 3 HP. Player has Silverguard Squire and Azurite Lion. Must win in one turn.

name: Divine Zeal
setup_description: Focuses on Lyonar faction mechanics and divine abilities.

name: Call to Action
description: Beginner Vetruvian challenge with Shadow Creep tiles
setup_description: Board has 8 Shadow Creep tiles at positions (4,0-4), (5,0-4). Teaches dealing with enemy tiles.

name: Knowledge of the Scions
description: Medium Vetruvian challenge with Mana tiles
setup_description: Board has Mana tiles at (4,0) and (5,2). Strategic resource management.

name: Sandbox Mode
setup_description: Open sandbox for testing and practice.
